item.title: Web is hard, reARMSEC aka ARMSec 2020
item.author: Author
item.description: At this year’s Armsec seventh annual information security conference - reARMSEC, I made a small presentation (Google slides, PDF version) on why the modern web is hard describing HackerOne’s top 10 most impactful and rewarded vulnerability types for 2020. As for the real-life examples of the bugs, I gathered reports mostly from HackerOne’s Hacktivity.
